title: Trendy NYC bathhouse plagued by grime, mold and worms, ex-workers say — as claims of pool infections go viral
description: Former workers at a trendy New York City spa claim the bitcoin-fueled spot is mold-ridden, worm-infested, and overheated — allegedly leaving them sick and traumatized. The complaints from three ex-staffers, detailed to The Post in recent interviews, come in the wake of viral claims by Reddit users who said they contracted urinary tract infections after...
